original_title: いけない！ルナ先生 愛LOVEムービー！！篇
overview: A boy, Kamiya Wataru, lives with his father after loses his mother. Suddenly, his father leaves the house for a while on a business trip abroad. His life takes an unexpected turn when a female college student, Hazuki Luna, moves in as a boarding student.
title: Watch-out! Luna, the Teacher
